name: Astellia Online
description: Astellia Online is a new MMORPG game that combines classic mechanics with an original Astell collection of fighting pets. Collect over 30 Astella with unique abilities and behaviors. Conquer mysterious dungeons, take part in massive PVE events or fight in the arena against other players. The game has a global Avalon event, in which the confrontation takes place between 3 factions of players. Astellia Online is a world for true heroes and adventurers in which magic and courage intertwine with insidiousness and intrigue.
